title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Digital Media-Enhanced Science Education Capacity-Building Project

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can select and utilize three or more appropriate digital media tools for designing science education content.
Learners can develop one or more science education modules using digital media through project-based learning.
Learners can improve their digital education design two or more times based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
